medical_history.chief_complaint: Midline palate perforation from cocaine abuse.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient, a 64-year-old man, has a 10-year history of cocaine use; increased to three times daily for the last 2 years. Three months prior to consultation, he experienced garbled and hypernasal speech, along with liquid and food discharge through the nose.
medical_history.social_history: Use of cocaine with nonmedical routes including snorting, leading to complications.
